title: 2D slasher The Spirit of the Samurai has cute animals and horrific spider mutants
description: New dark fantasy 2D platformer The Spirit of the Samurai looks like a hellish nightmare but at least it has cute animals.

title: The Precinct is a blast from the past for those who loved the original GTA
description: The Precinct's new trailer makes this new sandbox detective game look like a 2.5 remake of GTA with better graphics.

title: Cookie Cutter is a bloody, stylish 2D action game with an unexpected hero
description: Cookie Cutter's new trailer is an action-fuelled Metroidvania filled with blood, guts, and bright pink.

title: New psychological horror game Reveil is a PT-style terrifying trip
description: Reveil looks like the spiritual successor to the cult-classic horror game PT, and that makes me very excited.

title: You can play the cozy railroad sim Station to Station's demo right now
description: New railroad puzzle game Station to Station just got a new trailer and playable demo.

title: UE5 Showcase demonstrates ‘the future of visuals’ with stunning demos
description: The UE5 Showcase at the Future Games Show demonstrated yet again how much Unreal Engine has to offer.

title: SteamWorld Build’s new trailer shows off more of the intricate mining planet
description: The new trailer for SteamWorld Build looks at new features and locations in this alien mining planet.

title: New Layers of Fear trailer petrifies us in 4K thanks to fresh UE5 rebuild
description: Blooper Team's new launch trailer for Layers of Fear shows fans the brilliance of rebuilding the classic in UE5.

title: Laika: Aged Through Blood is a roguelike that channels OlliOlli and Dead Cells
description: New roguelite Laika: Aged Through Blood is a kaleidoscope of action, blood and beauty.

title: Be the trucker and not the truck in the simulator game Alaskan Road Truckers
description: Alaskan Road Truckers is the all new trucking simulator game that allows you to not only drive the truck but be the trucker.

title: Explore a desolate world and make it your home in crafting game Distant Bloom
description: Distant Bloom's newest trailer shows us even more of this cozy farming management and exploration game.

title: The latest game footage for Steel Seed shows apocalyptic maps and little friends
description: Stealth action game Steel Seed just got a new gameplay reveal trailer and it depicts aggressive enemies and wonderous landscapes.

title: Head Bangers is a rhythm battle royale for funky pigeons
description: New rhythm battle royale game Head Bangers sees Fall Guys meet Hi-Fi Rush but with added pigeons.

title: The Last Faith is like a 2D Bloodborne with all the blood, guts and goth
description: Kumi Souls Games just dropped another trailer for the Indie 2D Souls-like The Last Faith, and it may make Bloodborne fans go wild.

title: Lords of the Fallen reboot has all the best features of a modern Souls-like RPG
description: Lords of the Fallen reboot has all the dark fantasy RPG elements you could want with so much more.

title: Mad Max meets anime in all new racing RPG Resistor
description: Racing game Resistor looks like it's the perfect mash up of Mad Max and anime in new trailer.

title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Saturday, June 10 (game #502)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

title: Will the iPhone 15 finally get USB-C? Here's everything we know
description: Here’s everything we know about whether the iPhone 15 line will adopt the USB-C charging standard.
